flawed_nl_solution:
Black printer inks will cost him 2 x $11 = $<<2*11=22>>22.
Red printer inks will cost him 3 x $15 = $<<3*15=45>>45.
And yellow printer inks will cost him 2 x $13 = $<<2*13=62>>62.
The total amount he has to pay for the printer inks is $22 + $45 + $62 = $<<22+45+62=129>>129
Therefore, Phantom has to ask $129 - $50 = $<<129-50=79>>79 more from his mom to be able to buy the printer inks.
#### 79

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 26, not 62. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
